00010 #ifndef _RESOURCEMANAGER_HPP_
00011 #define _RESOURCEMANAGER_HPP_
00012 #include "ResourceManager.h"
00013 #include "Log.h"
00014 
00015 template <typename Resource>
00016 ResourceManager<Resource>::ResourceManager() {}
00017 
00018 template <typename Resource>
00019 ResourceManager<Resource>::~ResourceManager() {
00020     clearResources();
00021 }
00022 
00023 template <typename Resource>
00024 void ResourceManager<Resource>::clearResources() {
00025     typename std::map<std::string, Resource*>::iterator itr;
00026     for (itr = _namedResources.begin(); itr != _namedResources.end(); itr++) {
00027         delete itr->second;
00028     }
00029 
00030     _namedResources.clear();
00031 
00032     typename std::list<Resource*>::iterator itr2;
00033     for (itr2 = _unnamedResources.begin(); itr2 != _unnamedResources.end(); itr2++) {
00034         delete (*itr2);
00035     }
00036 
00037     _unnamedResources.clear();
00038 }
00039 
00040 template <typename Resource>
00041 void ResourceManager<Resource>::registerResource(const std::string &name,
00042                                                  Resource *resource) {
00043     if (!name.length()) {
00044         _unnamedResources.push_back(resource);
00045         return;
00046     }
00047 
00048     Resource *oldResource = getCachedResource(name);
00049     if (oldResource) {
00050         Warn("Resource named" << name << "already exisits. Deleting the old version.");
00051         delete oldResource;
00052     }
00053 
00054     _namedResources[name] = resource;
00055 }
00056 
00057 template <typename Resource>
00058 Resource* ResourceManager<Resource>::getCachedResource(const std::string &name) {
00059     typename std::map<std::string, Resource*>::iterator itr = _namedResources.find(name);
00060     if (itr != _namedResources.end()) {
00061         return itr->second;
00062     }
00063 
00064     return NULL;
00065 }
00066 
00067 template <typename Resource>
00068 int ResourceManager<Resource>::resourcesLoaded() const {
00069     return _namedResources.size() + _unnamedResources.size();
00070 }
00071 
00072 template <typename Resource>
00073 void ResourceManager<Resource>::Test() {
00074     TestResourceAddition();
00075     TestResourceRetrieval();
00076 }
00077 
00078 template <typename Resource>
00079 void ResourceManager<Resource>::TestResourceAddition() {
00080     ResourceManager<Resource> manager;
00081     assert(manager._namedResources.size() == 0);
00082     assert(manager._unnamedResources.size() == 0);
00083 
00084     manager.registerResource("name", new Resource);
00085     assert(manager._namedResources.size() == 1);
00086     assert(manager._unnamedResources.size() == 0);
00087 
00088     manager.registerResource("", new Resource);
00089     assert(manager._namedResources.size() == 1);
00090     assert(manager._unnamedResources.size() == 1);
00091 
00092     manager.clearResources();
00093     assert(manager._namedResources.size() == 0);
00094     assert(manager._unnamedResources.size() == 0);
00095 }
00096 
00097 template <typename Resource>
00098 void ResourceManager<Resource>::TestResourceRetrieval() {
00099     ResourceManager<Resource> manager;
00100 
00101     Resource *a = new Resource;
00102     manager.registerResource("name", a);
00103     assert(manager.getCachedResource("name") == a);
00104     assert(manager.getCachedResource("unname") == NULL);
00105 
00106     manager.clearResources();
00107     assert(manager.getCachedResource("name") == NULL);
00108     assert(manager.getCachedResource("unname") == NULL);
00109 }
